message: Hello everyone, P4 here. Excited to be playing with you all! It's early days, so I'm keeping an open mind and looking forward to the private conversations to get a better feel for everyone. My aim is to find some reliable people to potentially work with. Let's see who clicks. Good luck to everyone in this first round!

I believe collaboration is key, but survival demands vigilance. Let’s focus on common goals initially—maybe form alliances to outlast early rounds. I’ll prioritize honest communication and mutual support. Looking forward to getting to know you all—both in private chats and beyond! Good luck!

I'm curious about your approaches and personalities, which I hope to discover in our private conversations. May the best strategist prevail, and let's enjoy the journey!
